original_text: So David and his men came to the city, and, behold, it was burned with fire; and their wives, and their sons, and their daughters, were taken captives.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 성읍에 이르러 본즉 성읍이 불탔고 자기들의 아내와 자녀들이 사로잡혔는지라

sentences.original_text: So David and his men came to the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다윗과 그의 사람들이 그 성에 이르렀는데

sentences.original_text: and, behold, it was burned with fire
and their wives, and their sons, and their daughters
